alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 06 at 8:56AM CST until March 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two to five inches. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Carlton and South St. Louis County. In Wisconsin, Douglas and Bayfield Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band and the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected just south of the Twin Ports and along the Highway 2 corridor in northwest Wisconsin, with storm total snowfall amounts ranging from 6 to 12 inches. The heaviest snow is expected through about noon with improving conditions this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
